entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Initial Styles don't load correctly On new project when there's a spacing between project name on visual studio #57375
  • Retry Http3RequestTests.POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57373
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #57371
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #57370
  • [Blazor]AuthenticationState inside component return Authenticated as true after SignOut #57368
  • Blazor - Authentication cookie in a webapi call in the same project #57367
  • [Blazor] ValidationSummary component. Support the equivalent of ModelOnly in MVC #57365
  • Test failure: no exception in UserManagerWillUseTokenProviderInstanceOverDefaults #57361
  • Test failure: no exception in ResultsOfTResult1TResult2_Throws_InvalidOperationException_WhenResultIsNull #57360
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #57359
  • StreamRendering partial DOM Preservation #57358
  • InputDate Docs has a broken list #57357
    Backlog
  • Validate or sanitize client-controlled inputs to the JwtBearer WWW-Authenticate header #57356

Closed

  • ASP.NET Identity Core 2.1 - User can verify multiple times with the same two factor token #14423
    AuthPlanning
  • Expose method for testing for a local URL consumable without depending on MVC #56770
    Backlog
  • AsNonRenderingEventHandler + ErrorBoundary = unexpected behavior #54543
    9.0-rc2
  • IEmailSender does not exist in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI when targeting .NET 7/.NET 6 #57364
  • Shared project files marked as content are inconsistent on debug and after being published on Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App. #57146

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry #57376
    area-blazor
  • Retry POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57374
    area-infrastructure, HTTP3, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Fix navigation lock tests #57372
    area-infrastructure
  • Add `StringSyntax` to the `RouteAttribute` #57369
    area-blazor
  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware

Merged

  • Add RedirectHttpResult.IsLocalUrl() #57363
    area-minimal, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix CanBindToFormWithFiles #57355
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 10.0 #57340
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Use 7.* IdentityModel package in val pipeline #57349
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57339
    area-infrastructure
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
